title: TM Client Not Responding Stuck after "Victory/Defeat" end game

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Started happening like 4 patches ago. The "not responding" after victory/defeat doesnt always happen. It's like a 50% chance of it occurring everytime I play a game. 
Does anyone have any ideas on why I would freeze after a game and I have to restart client for it to work again?

replies.body:
There may be missing or corrupt files in your League installation that are causing this issue. As a quick step to see if this is true, I recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of your game files.

Let me know if a repair caused any change.
I've repaired the files, and the freezing happens less. Should i delete the air client and etc and reinstall like that?
